sub_title: Social Entrepreneur, Latin America Specialist and English Teacher
summary: I am a social entrepreneur, educator and anthropologist with international work experience, specialized in Latin America and gender topics. I have excellent communication skills in Dutch, English and Spanish and in-depth knowledge of Latin American culture. I am a passionate, ambitious, motivated and flexible team-worker who loves to work in an international working environment where I can combine my passion for other cultures with my passion for travelling and 'making a difference'. The past few years my interest in the field of philanthropy has grown through work-experience related to fairtrade, women cooperatives, women empowerment and reproductive health campaigns. At the same time I also hope to continue my career in education and combine my teaching experience with new challenges.
